bibl.title: Living Images. Egyptian Funerary Portraits in the Petrie Museum. (University College London, Institute of Archaeology Publications.)
bibl.note: tabl., nombr. figg. et pll. n./bl. et coul.

P. 7: J.P., Dedication [to Barbara Adams, 1945-2002]. - Part I. The Archaeological Context of the Portraits. Recovery and Rediscovery. - Part. II. Conservation of Mummy Portraits. Technology and Techniques. - Part III. Catalogue of the Panel Portraits in the Petrie Museum [1-53]. - Part IV. Barbara Adams. - Part V. Illustrated Index of Hawara Portraits. - Portrait Index. - Index.
PICTON Janet, Stephen QUIRKE and Paul C. ROBERTS (Edd.), Living Images. Egyptian Funerary Portraits in the Petrie Museum. (University College London, Institute of Archaeology Publications.)
Walnut Creek, CA, Left Coast Press, 2007, 4°, 318 pp., tabl., nombr. figg. et pll. n./bl. et coul. ISBN 978-1-59874-251-0. £25.
